what_you_do: The Prepared Group is a revenue growth strategy consulting firm that helps small and mid-market businesses develop and implement a strategy-first approach across marketing, sales, and business operations.
social_proof: Ken Cook is Google and Keap (fka Infusionsoft) certified.
business_focus: The Prepared Group helps small and mid-market businesses develop and implement a strategy-first approach across marketing, sales, and business operations to attract, convert, and retain the right customers.
